targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(event_time) AS time,
  level,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
GROUP BY time, level
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  event_time AS "Дата, время",
  data_separation AS "Разделение данных сеанса",
  user_name AS "Пользователь",
  computer AS "Компьютер",
  application_presentation AS "Приложение",
  event_presentation AS "Событие",
  transaction_status AS "Статус транзакции",
  metadata_presentation AS "Метаданные"
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  event_presentation AS event,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
GROUP BY event
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 10
